lines.text: My family hate me, you know.
It is not hard to see why.
Chief Inspector, you have been thinking again. I have warned you of this before.
Hercule Poirot is a detective not a bodyguard, monsieur.
Yes, it is I Hercule Poirot who speaks.

[referring to the missing diamonds]
They definitely only were missing, but only two people could have done it, and one of them might have done it as a joke.
I have yet to meet anybody in this household that has even the most rudimentary sense of humor.
Ah, good morning. Mr Harry Lee, I presume?
Brought in the big guns, have they?
It's a terrible thing to get old, Lydia.
